q1_strongest_subject: If you had to pick one, which subject area do you feel most confident in?
q2_academic_math: How would you rate your performance in Mathematics?
q3_academic_science: How would you rate your performance in Science subjects?
q4_academic_sst: How comfortable are you with Social Studies topics?
q5_academic_commerce: How do you find Economics or Commerce subjects?
q6_interests: What type of activities do you enjoy most in your free time?
q6_learning_style: You're given a project on a complex topic. What's your preferred way to work?
q7_learning_style: How do you prefer to learn new things?
q7_effort_tolerance: After school and homework, how much extra time are you willing to put in for self-study or preparing for competitive exams?

answers.excellent: Excellent - I consistently perform very well
answers.good: Good - I do well most of the time
answers.average: Average - It's okay, not my strongest area
answers.very_comfortable: Very comfortable - I find these topics engaging
answers.comfortable: Comfortable - I can handle them well
answers.somewhat_comfortable: Somewhat comfortable - It depends on the specific topic
answers.not_comfortable: Not very comfortable - I prefer other subjects
answers.difficult_concepts: Difficult - the concepts are hard to grasp
answers.creative_artistic: Creative or artistic activities (drawing, music, writing)
answers.reading_learning: Reading and learning about various topics
answers.reading_text: Reading from textbooks and written materials
answers.structured_guide: Follow a structured guide with clear steps and expected outcomes
answers.analyze_data: Dive into the data and analyze facts and figures to form a conclusion
answers.creative_exploration: Explore different creative ideas and present my findings in a unique way
answers.high_effort: A lot. I'm ready to dedicate 2-3 hours daily if needed
answers.moderate_effort: A moderate amount. Maybe an hour a day or more on weekends
answers.low_effort: Honestly, not much. I prefer to focus on schoolwork and have free time
